HELP_BRAIN: Beware of the ingenious Brain Robotrons...
HELP_ELECTRODE: Be sure to shoot or avoid the Electrodes in your path.
HELP_FAMILY: Save the last human family. Get to each of them before the Robotrons do.
HELP_FIRE: Fire in any direction by touching the right joystick or pressing the IJKL or NumPad arrow keys.
HELP_GRUNT: The force of Ground Roving Unit Network Terminators (GRUNT) Robotrons seek to destroy you.
HELP_HULK: The Hulk Robotrons seek out and eliminate the last human family.
HELP_MOVE: Move by touching the left joystick or pressing the WASD or arrow keys.
HELP_PROG: Brains posess the power to reprogram humans into sinister Progs.
HELP_QUARK: The Quarks are programmed to manufacture Tank Robotrons.
HELP_SPHERE: The Spheroids are programmed to manufacture Enforcer Robotrons.
HELP_START: Touch the coin to start a game.
